title: Xmas typebooze-up in T.O.
content:
(T.O., AKA, Toronto)

Or, (Mmmm) tea party, if it comes right down to it. :o)

who's in?

When? Dec. 17 is out for me (my son's birthday) but otherwise, I'm open to suggestions

Where? Some place central & on a transit route, not too pricy or trendy (read not overly crowded and loud) . The closer to Union Station, the better for me, and, as it happens, there is no shortage of pubs (and what have you) in that area.
author: russellm

comments.content:
What? No replies?

T.O. Typo types hate the baby Jesus?

Say it ain't so.  
I refuse to believe that …

:o)

-=®=-
Sorry, I just moved out of town (to Orangeville) and things are really hectic getting settled in here, so don't get to the big smoke that much for socializing.

This:  
And let me tell you, it is a pain in the neck

Only 87% of that pain is RIM’s fault (IMaHO).

:o)

R

plus this:
